Text saved: In the last 200 years, technology and health became better.
So, fewer children died when they were young.
This made the number of people grow very fast.
Big families had more children.
These children grew up and had their own children.

Contraception is something that stops a woman from having a baby.
In the 1960s, more people could get contraception.
So, women started to have fewer babies.
Before, a woman had about six babies.
Now, a woman has about two babies.
